title: Dewkin Chestnut
content:
Dewkin Chestnut is an item collected with the Gatherer profession.

Used to brew the +60 Potent variation of the Strength Arborae Potion with the Alchemist profession.

Stored in the Potion Reagents Bank in the Apothecary in Hopeport.

Sold to Zeltay Tramagan at the Town Square in Hopeport for 360 copper.
